hero.title:
Maximize Your
Investments with
Margin Lending
hero.subtitle:
Flexible financing solutions designed to give you
seamless access to capital when you need it.

murabahaFinancing.title: <0>Murabaha</0> Financing
murabahaFinancing.subtitle: Murabaha is a Shariah-compliant sale, not an interest-based loan. ICAP purchases the securities and resells them to you at cost plus a pre-agreed profit, based on your instructions. You repay the full amount (cost and profit) after six months in one lump sum.

card1.title: Saudi Market<0/>Only
card1.subtitle: Murabaha is available exclusively for portfolios focused on the Saudi market.

card2.title: Flexible Loan<0/>Usage
card2.subtitle: The approved loan can be utilized partially or in full as you need.

card3.title: Coverage<0/>Requirements
card3.subtitle: A minimum coverage of 200% must be maintained.

card4.title: Eligibility<0/>Criteria
card4.subtitle: Limits are based on pre-defined criteria and guidelines.

marginLendingFeatures.title: Go Further with <0>Margin Lending</0>
marginLendingFeatures.subtitle: Unlock extra capital with our margin lending solutions and give your investments room to grow.

feature1.title: Real-time<0/>buying power
feature1.description: Access extra investment funds<0/>instantly, no need to wait for<0/>settlement.

feature2.title: Seamless Margin<0/>Access
feature2.description: Unlock capital from your current<0/>portfolio while keeping your<0/>strategy intact.

feature3.title: Built-In<0/>Compliance
feature3.description: Both Margin Overdraft and<0/>Murabaha Financing meet<0/>regulatory standards.

marginOverdraft.title: <0>Margin</0> <1>Overdraft</1>
marginOverdraft.subtitle: Overdraft is a margin facility product that<0/>grants you to overdraw the investment<0/>account with an agreed predefined buying<0/>power.<0/><0/>You'll need to maintain a coverage ratio, and<0/>a monthly fee applies. Repayment is only<0/>required if the agreement ends without<0/>renewal.

tailoredFunds.title: Tailored Funds for Different Goals
tailoredFunds.subtitle: Invest in real estate funds built to support your financial goals, whether you're seeking capital accumulation or income stability.

card1.title: Real Estate<0/>Development Funds
card1.subtitle: Designed to grow your capital over time, the fund invests in real estate development and exits through strategic property sales.

card2.title: Infrastructure<0/>Development Funds
card2.subtitle: Turn undeveloped land into opportunity. We invest in raw plots, build infrastructure, and sell when the value peaks, so your capital grows with the land.

card3.title: Real Estate<0/>Income Funds
card3.subtitle: The fund seeks to generate steady income by investing in a portfolio of high-grade real estate assets, chosen for stability, quality, and strong cash flow performance.

card4.title: REITs (Real Estate<0/>Investment Trust)
card4.subtitle: Earn steady income and long-term growth through a handpicked portfolio of premium real estate properties with stable cash flow.

investmentStrategy.title: Our Investment Strategy
investmentStrategy.subtitle: Discover our comprehensive approach to investment management

card1.title: Disciplined<0/>Process
card1.subtitle: A consistent investment<0/>process, driven by<0/>fundamental research<0/>and broad analytical<0/>tools, guides our<0/>decisions.

card2.title: Focus on Risk<0/>Management
card2.subtitle: We place strong emphasis on risk<0/>management and down-market<0/>strategies to safeguard our clients'<0/>positions.

card3.title: Research-Driven<0/>Approach
card3.subtitle: Our portfolio management combines top-<0/>down analysis with bottom-up research<0/>for a balanced strategy.

card4.title: Diversification
card4.subtitle: We firmly believe that<0/>portfolio diversification is key<0/>to managing unsystematic, or<0/>company-specific risks.

card5.title: Extensive<0/>Research
card5.subtitle: Our choices to adjust holdings are grounded in<0/>comprehensive research within a structured and<0/>disciplined process.

card6.title: Performance<0/>Evaluation
card6.subtitle: Performance attribution and evaluation are routinely<0/>performed to keep us aligned with our investment<0/>targets.

investmentPhilosophy.title: <0>Investment</0> Philosophy
investmentPhilosophy.subtitle: Alistithmar Capital follows three guiding principles<0/>in its investment philosophy.
investmentPhilosophy.description: We believe that identifying long-term market trends and understanding the structural changes behind them are essential for creating consistent value over time. Using thorough research, we pinpoint investment opportunities that deliver lasting growth. We also maintain continuous monitoring to ensure our investments meet objectives while fully complying with laws and regulations.

slide1.subtitle: By your side, from IPOs to mergers, our experts deliver clarity, confidence, and results that move you forward.
